DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine the impact of sociocognitive and emotional factors on the time of the initial consult
DOC.brief_title: Interventional Study Collecting Quantitative and Qualitative Data About Patient With Non Treated Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: identify wich sociocognitive factors influence the delay to go to a doctor after the emergence of first symptoms
DOC.criteria: age â‰¥ 18 years oral cavity cancer, oropharynx cancer, hypopharynx cancer, larynx cancer non treated cancer patient informed of his diagnosis speak fluent french patient covered by health insurance signed informed consent Inclusion Criteria for "interviewed " patients : no speech troubles patient consents being recorded history of cancer psychological history patient under guardianship
